other_title: エンジェルブレイドパニッシュ！ (Japanese)
plot: Moena was a normal college girl until she discovered that she had special powers hidden by her father within her body. When Dark Mother and her army of sexy demon women threaten the virgins of the world, Moena transforms into the naked masked heroine Angel Blade. Moena's stepmother, the well endowed Kyōka, is kidnapped by Dark Mother. With the help of a team of barely dressed heroines and the dark-skinned succubus Nailkaiser, a former villain, Angel Blade storms the demons' stronghold and face off with Dark Mother herself.
